mapper.insert: INSERT INTO petsitter( petsitter_no, member_id, petsitter_nick, petsitter_career, career_info, available_day, available_time, sitter_checklist, sitter_checklist2, sitter_checklist3, sitter_checklist4, photo, sitter_accept, petsitter_email ) VALUES ( PETSITTER_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{petsitter_nick}, #{petsitter_career}, #{career_info}, #{available_time}, #{sitter_checklist}, #{sitter_checklist2}, #{sitter_checklist3}, #{sitter_checklist4}, #{photo}, #{sitter_accept}, #{petsitter_email} )
